post.body: I mean, she's just a very social and interesting person - you should just follow her and see what she's up to. =]
Hey, my wife's username on here is NickyMartini! You guys should become twitterbuddies! I landed on you randomly lol. ttyl. =]
I'm finally going to bedd - 'night everybody - I'll count the Stockwells later! thank you! Oh, and anyone's free to keep count. now, it's 5.
Oh, Sweet child o' mine! Welcome brother Stockwell! Say "Hi" to my brother (theadra) and welcome him into this community please! Thank you!
My BCGs are making my vision distorted - I think I like it...
Sa-weet- go stockwells! my bro +a random dude are following me. Ahh, I might just have an online family reunion - now wouldn't that be nice?
ok, so I just looked up my last name in the "find people" area of twitter and then I started to follow like 16 users with that last name...
You know, I was gonna go to sleep, but I'm just not ready to - I can't just bring myself to pass out - I think I need a golf club.
I'm tired now - I've updated my myspace if anyone cares - and I also messaged some old friends. Well, good night.
Well, I don't seriously know why I'm searching for music now - I just learned about this new band called the Straight Line uh.. Something...
Okay, so my texting still wont work, but I'm good with it. I'm still up however cuz the internet has gotten the best of me. lol.
trying to add twitter to my international cellphone so I can have fun at work - but it's not working... I guess I'll try something else.
I'm up at 11:36pm in Korea checking my myspace and dreading waking up at 6:00am tomorrow and I'm also missing my Wife Nicky so much!!!
